msIdentifier.idno: Misc Mss Box 23 Folder 26 Box 23 Folder 26

msContents.summary: A wedding invitation to celebrate the marriage of Aḥmad ʻAlī Khān Bahādur addressed to Dr. George Ranken of the East India Company and his wife Lady Agnes Allan Ranken. The invitation is on red paper, written in Persian, and the script in painted gold leaf. Accompanied by an envelope with a personal stamp of the sender addressed to Dr. Ranken.

msItem.title: Aḥmad ʻAlī Khān Bahādur wedding invitation
Aḥmad ʻAlī Khān Bahādur wedding invitation, 1811

history.provenance: Sold at auction at Lyon & Turnbull, Edinburgh, May 17 2017, lot 120A.
